ValidationRule.description: Parent Vendor should not be blank in case All WM Parent Vendors is Unchecked
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( All_WM_Vendors__c = false, Parent_VID__c = null, RecordType.Name = 'STP Eligibility')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If "All WM Parent Vendors" is unchecked, then Listed WM Parent VID(s) must be provided.
